instructions: Hi! It's your brain again. I'm a phraser now.
You might already know what these are if you have played the chaser game.
Click "show letters" to start the phraser game.
Once you click "show letters", you should NOT go out of the game. That is, this screen should not be closed.
If you go out, then it is considered that the game is over. This is done to prevent cheating. You'll understand why in the next instructions.
You are currently here. (Duh!)
After you click "show letters", you see the letters collected by a chaser.
You have 10 seconds to study the letters and think about possible words that can be formed.
The phraser game starts as soon as it's 10 seconds or if you press the "start game" button.
At the top left of the screen, you will see your total score and time left to form words from those letters.
If the phraser game has 'n' letters, then the total time of the phraser game is 3 times 'n' seconds.
You can manually end the game by clicking the 'end game' button in the top right corner.
Here, you can see all the valid words you formed.
Valid word - meaningful English words, common abbreviations or words specific to your subreddit, which were added by moderator to the dictionary.
Invalid word - bad words, curse words, slurs. Not a valid word - random set of letters trying to fit in XD
If you submit a valid word, your letters are converted to points, you get 1 point for each letter in the valid word you formed.
If you type an invalid word or if the word you formed is not a valid word, letters will return back to the typing area.
Under "current word:" you can see the word you are typing.
To submit the word you typed, click "submit".
To clear all the letters you typed, click "clear" (yes. No backspace, to make the game challenging *evil smile*).
Each letter in the "available letters:" section can be used exactly once to form a word.
You can see if a word is valid, not valid or invalid here.
The "submit" button is enabled only if at least 2 letters are below "current word".
The "clear" button is enabled only if at least 1 letter is below "current word".
Once the game is over, you will see this screen with all those details.
When you try to play again by interacting with this post, you will see this page only.
That's all. Now you know all the instructions! Now go phrase! I think you remember how to start the game! Hehe :)
